name.zh: 户外登山双肩背包（多颜色）

description.en: A rugged outdoor hiking backpack built for day hikes and travel. Features a multi-pocket layout, supportive back system, and external attachment points for gear. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), capacity, pocket configuration, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 适合徒步与旅行的耐用户外双肩背包。多口袋收纳结构，背负支撑更舒适，并配有外部挂点便于固定装备。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、容量、口袋配置、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: High-density Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：高密度尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
织带：加固织带肩带/束带（可定制）
五金：插扣/调节扣/D 环等（可定制）

en.Compartments: Main compartment + front pocket + side pockets + internal organizer (options)
en.Use Case: Day hike, outdoor travel, commute-ready outdoor pack
en.Customization: Fabric, capacity, pockets, logo, lining, zippers & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 主仓 + 前袋 + 侧袋 + 内部收纳（可选）
zh.背负系统: 背部/肩带加厚衬垫（可定制）
zh.外挂功能: 外部挂点/束带便于携带装备
zh.适用场景: 徒步、户外旅行、通勤户外风背包
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料、容量、口袋结构、Logo、内里、拉链五金、包装
